Skills.title: Web Development
Skills.description: I have various experiences in web development, including front-end and back-end development.

Skills.title: Design
Skills.description: I was a designer when I was a member of my campus organization. I spent more than two years in this role and created over 1,000 designs.

Skills.title: English
Skills.description: A keen English learner, in touch with the language on a daily basis. Being a screen junkie helps me improve this skill.

Skills.title: Problem Solving
Skills.description: I have a strong interest in problem solving, especially in programming. I have participated in several competitions and won some of them.

Skills.title: Teamwork
Skills.description: I have experience working in teams, both in organizations and in projects. I am able to work well with others and contribute to the team's success.

Skills.title: Communication
Skills.description: I have good communication skills, both verbal and written. I am able to convey my ideas clearly and effectively.

Skills.title: Time Management
Skills.description: I am able to manage my time effectively and prioritize tasks. I can work under pressure and meet deadlines.

Skills.title: Adaptability
Skills.description: I am able to adapt to new situations and learn quickly. I am open to feedback and willing to improve.

Skills.title: Creativity
Skills.description: I have a creative mindset and can think outside the box. I enjoy brainstorming and coming up with new ideas.

Skills.title: Leadership
Skills.description: I have experience leading teams and projects. I can motivate and inspire others to achieve common goals.
